      impossible. it can't be done

      the hardest part is remembering how easy it is

4.15.22  5:46 pm   how to stop freaking out?

      write down 10 things

      no

4.15.22  4:47 pm   what are a few things on your not to-do list, i.e. your anti-bucket list, i.e. your never-wish list, i.e. your un-check list

      how about destroying the whole universe

4.15.22  1:55 pm   what should i say instead of "how was your day" to someone 

      how about 'what day is it'

4.15.22  1:15 pm   will we ever see the guy from i'm a princess again

      yes

4.15.22  11:08 am   do you ever try using instruments you aren't as familiar with to shake up some inspiration?

      yes

4.15.22  7:10 am   what was the background music for rain fact

      my own custom score as always

4.15.22  6:27 am   I miss that magical feeling of pure euphoria I used to get when I first discovered my favourite musical artist. I think I'm never going to get it back. Is there any way to get it back, or should I just accept that it's never going to be like it was again?

      you will get it. there's other things to discover. maybe you can even make some of your own things to discover

4.15.22  1:07 am   I keep having suicidal thoughts/actions and constantly blaming myself for the relationships I broke in the past couple of months. The loneliness and uncertainty of the future keep haunting me. Filling my time with other tasks or your songs does nothing to help. I don't know how to control those feelings anymore. What can I do? 

      take a long walk and see if you can remember all those things you were going to do, but didn't get around to it yet

4.14.22  10:53 pm   Do you read much?

     sure

     What would you say is your favorite book?

      i can't think of any books

4.14.22  10:17 pm   How to make the perfect snowball

      do some climate change and make the whole planet into a snowball

4.14.22  9:31 pm   how long is the next song?

      3:19

4.14.22  8:27 pm   i think i've figured it out: will your next video be released on 4/32?

      no

4.14.22  8:11 pm   Who do you think will win the NBA finals? 

      pheonix

4.14.22  6:41 pm   Do you edit the questions when posting them? 

      absolutely not

4.14.22  6:29 pm   do you recommend joining a band as a starting point for someone who has played for a long time just for fun?

     couldn't be a starting point if you've already started long ago

      also, how to get over my paralyzing fear of singing in public?

     the only way to do it is to do it

4.14.22  6:25 pm   Do all your songs take place in the same cinematic universe?

      actual universe

4.14.22  4:34 pm   would you rather have unlimited bacon, but no games. or games, unlimited games, but no games

      i'd prefer to have games and no games. try to understand the paradox

4.14.22  3:04 pm   I have a theory that the vast majority of people are terrible at understanding other people. In fact, I'm convinced that they don't even understand themselves. They may think they do, but they really don't. Do you agree with this theory?

      yes and no. if the theory is true, it also perhaps means that we have failed to understand the fact that we actually do understand everyone better than we think

4.14.22  1:17 pm   what key is the next song in?

      B, with a side order of F#min, F#, and A

4.14.22  12:59 pm   Writing music has always been difficult for me, but I want to do it more than most things. I have made tons of attempted songs, and there are people who say that they enjoy listening to them, but I still personally struggle with the idea that nothing I make is good. The little details like the tone of my voice, uneven piano playing, and overall quality issues suppress my music making constantly. People say that I shouldn't worry about it and that I am a perfectionist, but I don't feel like I can release or share anything I make the the world without knowing personally that it is of a proper level of quality, and none of the songs I have made have reached that insurmountable goal I've set myself. My question is, what should I do? Is there something else I can try to improve my opinion of my music, or should I just keep trying to make something that I think is good, and that I know I will never make.

      it seems like it might be time to launch into an adventure of deliberately making the most 'terrible' music you can. this might the perfect shake-up you need to get things going

4.14.22  11:56 am   i have been thinking about,and using, your advice and practice, of coming up with your words while singing to them. it really was helpful, and it made me realize that every singer has different capabilities of singing different types of syllabbles musically, and for it all to make sense you need to remember what comes most comfortable to you. and the only way to remember that is to sing? at first maybe, this might be improvable... i wanted to share my thoughts about that, and also, to ask you some questions about the topic. do you feel like there are specific lyrical vocal-zones for you that makes it hard to sing?

     yes

     and also, are you comfortable with singing a song in a language that you don't know?

     i don't usually do it, but that sounds like a lovely thing to do, and it's on my to-do list

      when you do it, do you try to understand the lyrics first?

     absolutely. that's crucial even in english

4.14.22  11:32 am   What is the first non-alphanumeric character that appears in the lyrics of your next song?

      '

4.14.22  10:20 am   So, from the questions page I picked up info; your next song has four words in the title and starts with "at"
is it at the airport terminal, 2

      absolutely not

4.14.22  5:32 am   do you consider "The Moon Is Made of Cheese (But I Can't Taste It)" and "Here Comes The Sun" to be soul sisters, in a way?

      no

4.14.22  3:24 am   ive been playing drums and keys for a while now, and recently i picked up bass. any advice?

      if you can't join a real band, and i understand if you can't because the world is weird now, then i'd recommend you start playing along to song-recordings as soon as possible. mute the bass frequencies on the recording so there's room for you. you can use an equalizer to do this, or if you don't have that, you can remove the bass by just unplugging your headphones and playing the song through a phone or tablet speaker

4.14.22  3:09 am   sometimes when i sit outside, i think about what i might do if i didn't have the computers i have to do music.
do you ever think about things like this?

     yes

      what musical things might you participate in if the technology we have now weren't available?

     stage performances

4.14.22  12:30 am   is your next song not about boats?

      yes it is not

      yes

      F

4.13.22  3:18 pm   If there are 4 words in the title of the next song and the first word is "at," is it somehow related to At The Airport Terminal?

4.13.22  2:32 pm   where is the mmon

      somewhere around the earth

4.13.22  1:47 pm   I struggle with being labeled as this absurdly intense person. And, you know...it is kinda true. But, what exhausts me is being ostracized for it. It's pretty clear by virtue of your art...you're intense too. I'm wondering how you've handled it. It is a lot of pain to bear on the not so good days. 

      at some point you'll just go ahead and do your work, because no one else can

4.13.22  12:59 pm   best time signature?

      regular

4.13.22  11:53 am   I was supposed to be listening to music and studying and then just did a bad thing played. 3 minutes of pure groove :). my question is how do you do basslines? like the bassline at "it's a sad mad and bad glad dream" as far as I can tell goes c# f# g#. what made you make the bassline ascend when the rest of the melodies were descending? is this something that "just happens" when writing music? 

     i'm not sure if i'd agree about those specifics, but yes, music just happens. this is particularly annoying to those of us who've ever wanted to pin it down to an exact science

4.13.22  9:42 am   what is a parallel universe

      a universe oriented in exactly the same direction as another universe

      closes

      yes
